Key Match Events: Jalen Suggs left the game in a wheelchair after suffering back spasms and was ruled out for the remainder of the contest.
Post-Match Reflections: Magic coach Jamahl Mosley stated that Suggs will be re-evaluated on Saturday.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Tristan da Silva led the team in scoring with 25 points in Suggs' absence.
Goga Bitadze contributed 11 points, 13 rebounds, and 7 assists, nearly recording a triple-double.
Others: The Magic have been dealing with multiple injuries, including Paolo Banchero, Franz Wagner, Moe Wagner, Anthony Black, and Gary Harris.
